title: What can ya do?
author: JGray
text:
Chrys and Mandrake get malls and thievery and alien used saucer salesmen. Theresa and William get a wasteland filled with plastic coated evil, cliche yuppies.

Melody and Kludge get a hot tub on the beach.

We'll be returning to the problems of Chrys and Mandrake with the next page. There'll be action! Adventure! And some anime references. Keep reading!
